mapper.select: select p.name as project, m.DESCRIPTION as stage, s.PROCESS as process, s.TIME as time, s.PROCESSTIME as processTime, s.SCHEDULE_IN as inDate, s.SCHEDULE_OUT as outDate, s.QUANTITY_IN as inQuantity, s.QUANTITY_OUT as outQuantity, s.ORDER_NUMBER as orderNumber from im_sample s LEFT JOIN sch_milestone_schema m on m.id=s.MILESTONE_FK LEFT JOIN im_project p on p.ID = s.PROJECT_FK where m.IS_VALID=1 and p.IS_VALID=1 and s.IS_VALID = 1 and p.NAME = #{project} ORDER BY s.ID

select p.name as project, a.USER_FK as user, u.name as name, r.ROLE_NAME as role from im_project_actor a LEFT JOIN im_project p on p.ID = a.PROJECT_FK LEFT JOIN im_project_role r on r.ROLE_ID = a.ROLE_FK LEFT JOIN idm_user u on u.USER_ID = a.USER_FK where a.IS_VALID=1 and p.IS_VALID=1 and r.IS_VALID=1 and p.name = #{project} ORDER BY r.SORT

select p.name as project, m.END_DATE_PLAN as endDatePlan, m.END_DATE as endDate, s.DESCRIPTION as milestone from im_milestone m LEFT JOIN im_project p on p.ID = m.PROJECT_FK LEFT JOIN sch_milestone_schema s on s.ID = m.MILESTONE_FK where m.IS_VALID=1 and p.IS_VALID=1 and s.sort < 90 and p.name = #{project} order by s.sort
